review: Doctor was very friendly & was able to explain the problem in bits & pieces, I’ve received a few suggestions which I’m going to implement & see the progress!

Consulted dr.Rajesh sir for lower back pain. Visited so many doctors before. But I think it’s his magic hands. The pain disappeared after the treatment and I’m highly thankful for him. Will suggest dr.Rajesh and Kasper clinic for all my friends and family. 
5 start service in Kasper.
Consulted for slip disc.Took some time but recovered very well. Dr.Rajesh is one of the few doctors who is genuine towards the patient.Hospital is hygienic and the X -ray technician is helpful.
Thanks to dr.Rajesh for superb treatment sir, Clinic is very hygienic. Never seen any hospital being maintained so well.
Had a cut on my face while at work and visited Kasper as it’s the nearest clinic. Dr.Rajesh has put sutures and have painkillers. The cut helped very nicely leaving no mark. **** ******* ******

My son devolved a limping walk after falling from bike. Dr.Rajesh examined and prescribed physiotherapy. Now his walking is proper. Thankyou doctor. 
Also thankyou physiotherapist saddam and nurse sani for taking very good care of my son.
Great doctor. Spends enough time with patients never hurrying. The clinic is very posh and good maintenance. X ray room is very clean unlike other places.

Dr.Rajesh is extremely professional and understands the patients problems. 
Never made us wait. Always on time. 
Kasper is very well maintained for a clinic. Reception staff are courteous.
I have visited Kasper clinic for my uncle to Dr. Rajesh for his knee joint pain. Doctor ** **** **** ** explain his problems and he is good in taking care of elderly people.
